meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6999.

td.p: Chris Grinvalds, a high school history teacher and coach from Bennington, Nebraska
Jennifer Giles, a third grade teacher from Longmont, Colorado
Mary Bayer, a middle and high school drama teacher from Hoffman Estates, Illinois

tr.td: THE MATH & NOTHING BUT THE MATH

Jennifer
')

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Double Jeopardy! Round:

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: [To Chris] And if it makes you feel any better, the endangered species list, which you were going for, is wrong also.)
ChrisWhat is the endangered famous landmarks?
$8,400
MaryWhat are the wonders of the world
$0
JenniferWhat is the World Heritage sites?
$400
the World Heritage (Sites) list')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', 'Efforts to save historic treasures threatened by the creation of the Aswan High Dam led UNESCO to create this list')

tr.td: Efforts to save historic treasures threatened by the creation of the Aswan High Dam led UNESCO to create this list

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans.
